# COVID-19 response activities

```{r}
job %>% 
  filter(presentation == 0) %>% 
  filter(other_honors == 0) %>% 
  filter(covid == 1) %>% 
  filter(primary == 'covid') %>% 
  arrange(desc(year_start),
          job,
          position) %>% 
  mutate(when = 
           case_when(year_end == 'NULL' ~ glue::glue("{year_start}"),
                     TRUE ~ glue::glue("{year_start} - {year_end}")) 
           ) %>% 
  detailed_entries(
    what = position,
    when = when,
    with = job,
    where = Location,
    why = activity
  )
```

# Other activities

```{r}
other_activites %>% 
  arrange(desc(year_start),
          role,
          institution) %>% 
  mutate(when = 
           case_when(year_end == 'NULL' ~ glue::glue("{year_start}"),
                     year_end == 'NA' ~ glue::glue("{year_start}"),
                     is.na(year_end) ~ glue::glue("{year_start}"),
                     TRUE ~ glue::glue("{year_start} - {year_end}")) 
           ) %>% 
  detailed_entries(
    what = role,
    when = when,
    with = institution,
    where = location,
    why = activity)
```
